remarks: The sum of two infinite group sums.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 19-Sep-2015.)  (Proof shortened by AV, 24-Jul-2019.)
statement:
tsmsadd.b $e |- B = ( Base ` G ) $.
tsmsadd.p $e |- .+ = ( +g ` G ) $.
tsmsadd.1 $e |- ( ph -> G e. CMnd ) $.
tsmsadd.2 $e |- ( ph -> G e. TopMnd ) $.
tsmsadd.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. V ) $.
tsmsadd.f $e |- ( ph -> F : A --> B ) $.
tsmsadd.h $e |- ( ph -> H : A --> B ) $.
tsmsadd.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. ( G tsums F ) ) $.

tsmsadd $p |- ( ph -> ( X .+ Y ) e. ( G tsums ( F oF .+ H ) ) ) $.
